001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
006
007import java.util.Map;
008
009@Regularization.Target(Regularization.Target.Type.WEIGHTS)
010@Regularization.Effect({Regularization.Effect.Type.SPARSITY, Regularization.Effect.Type.SHRINKAGE})
011public class ElasticNet<N extends Number> implements ExplicitRegularization<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
012
013    public static String HP_LAMBDA_1 = "lambda1";
014    public static String HP_LAMBDA_2 = "lambda2";
015
016    private final LASSO<N> lasso;
017    private final Ridge<N> ridge;
018
019    public ElasticNet(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
020        this(new LASSO<>(typeSupport), new Ridge<>(typeSupport));
021    }
022
023    private ElasticNet(LASSO<N> lasso, Ridge<N> ridge) {
024        this.lasso = lasso;
025        this.ridge = ridge;
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getNumberTypeSupport() {
030        return lasso.getNumberTypeSupport();
031    }
032
033    public N getLambda1() {
034        return lasso.getLambda();
035    }
036
037    public void setLambda1(N lambda1) {
038        lasso.setLambda(lambda1);
039    }
040
041    public N getLambda2() {
042        return ridge.getLambda();
043    }
044
045    public void setLambda2(N lambda2) {
046        ridge.setLambda(lambda2);
047    }
048
049    public N lossPenalty(Array<N> parameters) {
050        N loss1 = lasso.lossPenalty(parameters);
051        N loss2 = ridge.lossPenalty(parameters);
052        return getNumberTypeSupport().add(loss1, loss2);
053    }
054
055    public N gradientAdjustment(N parameter) {
056        N grad1 = lasso.gradientAdjustment(parameter);
057        N grad2 = ridge.gradientAdjustment(parameter);
058        return getNumberTypeSupport().add(grad1, grad2);
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
063        return Map.of(HP_LAMBDA_1, getLambda1(), HP_LAMBDA_2, getLambda2());
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
068        if (HP_LAMBDA_1.equals(name)) {
069            setLambda1(getNumberTypeSupport().cast(value));
070        } else if (HP_LAMBDA_2.equals(name)) {
071            setLambda2(getNumberTypeSupport().cast(value));
072        }
073    }
074}
